definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Former Bosnian Serb general Ratko Mladic spent sixteen years in hiding.
sentences.chinese: 前波斯尼亚塞族将军姆拉迪奇藏匿花了十六年。

sentences.english: In Kenya the Massai people usually greet each other by spitting on his or her body.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚马塞族人用往对方身上吐口水的方式打招呼。

sentences.english: In their hearts, many Serbs know this.
sentences.chinese: 很多塞族人心里明白这一点。

sentences.english: Not always. How can you tell whether someone is Muslim or Serb?
sentences.chinese: 也不完全这样，你能区分谁是穆斯林，谁是塞族吗？

sentences.english: Some Serbs had threatened further violence.
sentences.chinese: 一些塞族人威胁进一步的攻击。

sentences.english: Security officials said Serbs then set two Albanian shops alight.
sentences.chinese: 安全官员说，塞族人随后点燃了两家阿族人的商店。

sentences.english: But now in Kosovo we Serbs who remain do not have any rights.
sentences.chinese: 但是在现在的科索沃，我们塞族人失去了所有的权利。

pinyin: A1 er3 ba1 ni2 ya4 ren2

definition: Chechnya, a republic in southwestern Russia/Chechen
Hutu, an ethnic group in Rwanda and Burundi
Tutsi, an ethnic group in Rwanda and Burundi
Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO)/abbr. for 巴勒斯坦解放組織|巴勒斯坦解放组织[Ba1 le4 si1 tan3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1]
